pages.title: Second Post
pages.text: This is the second post of a series of posts. It shows an embedded youtube video. To do so I followed the tutorial . Since some of the materials there are out of date, so I explain a little bit in the following. You could use the plugin liquid_tags.youtube in pelicanconf.py file. #pelicanconf.py PLUGINS = [ 'liquid_tags.youtube' ] And then include the following line in your post second_post.md . {% youtube Qq-5frjUfK0 [640] [390] %} Notice here the difference between the one in the tutorial and the above is that I only write the video id for the youtube video instead of the full https address.
